lines.text: You know what happens to boys who smoke?
Sure. Don't grow high. I'm gonna grow up to be a midget.

[Taken aback by Rair's prissy appearance]
So you were andy's bodyguard? Eh, come again?
Don't be misled, Mr. mason. I keep my trousers pressed, my nails polished, but I also keep my biceps in trim.

[Surprised to see Sheila in Benedict's living room]
Hello. Are you the hostess here?
If I were, you wouldn't be a guest.
You know, you're a very nice fella. Would you like to grow a little older?
Come with me, Mason, and forget about your boat.
Forget about my boat? Just as simple as that? It was a stinkin' little boat, but it fed me pork and beans today but, who knows, maybe tomorrow steak and cake.
